Function# AudioGetCurrentHostTime()

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.0+

```
func AudioGetCurrentHostTime() -> UInt64
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/coreaudio/audiogetcurrenthosttime()#return-value)

A UInt64 containing the current host time.

## [Discussion](/documentation/coreaudio/audiogetcurrenthosttime()#discussion)

Gets the current host time.
